welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tangerang, Indonesia! Prepare to be captivated by the city's vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Tangerang has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Baso Jono Mukti
restaurants.description: Baso Jono Mukti is a indonesian meatball restaurant located in Tangerang.
restaurants.address: Jalan Daan Mogot No. 46 (Samping Polres Tangerang), Tangerang, Banten 15118

restaurants.name: Burger King
restaurants.description: Burger King is a burger joint located in Tangerang.

restaurants.name: Shihlin Taiwan Street Snacks
restaurants.description: Shihlin Taiwan Street Snacks is a fast food restaurant located in Tangerang.
restaurants.address: Balékota, GF (Jl. Jenderal Sudirman KM 10), Tangerang, Banten

restaurants.name: Sop dan Sate Kambing Ibu Ajum
restaurants.description: Sop dan Sate Kambing Ibu Ajum is a bbq joint located in Tangerang.
restaurants.address: Jl. Otista Pasar Baru Tangerang (Jl. KS Tubun), Tangerang, Banten

restaurants.name: Roti Bakar 88 Samping GOR
restaurants.description: Roti Bakar 88 Samping GOR is a café located in Tangerang.
